**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 105 2.0 _[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) For the purposes of Society play, remove the final clause of Evangelize that states “at the GM’s discretion, a target that genuinely changes its perspective to support your faith as a result of the argument is also otherwise unaffected.”_ **Prerequisites** Master in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6); you follow a deity or philosophy --- You point out a detail that incontrovertibly supports your faith, causing a listener’s mind to whirl. Attempt a Diplomacy check and compare the result to the Will DC of a single target that can hear you and understands your language; that target is then temporarily immune to Evangelize with respect to your deity or philosophy for 1 day. A creature that already agrees with you is unaffected, and at the GM’s discretion, a target that genuinely changes its perspective to support your faith as a result of the argument is also otherwise unaffected. **Critical Success** The target is [stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for 1 round.
**Success** The target is stupefied 1 for 1 round.
**Failure** The target is unaffected.
